title: 毎日王冠の後に・震えちまう脚

text.jpText:
イナリワンは『毎日王冠』で1着を逃した。
このままでは『年度代表ウマ娘』を獲れない
かもしれないと焦る。
text.enText:
Inari One missed the first place in the 
"Mainichi Royal Crown". She was worried that 
she might not be able to win the "Horse of 
the Year" title if she continued like this. 
Inari One was worried that she might not be 
able to win the "horsegirl of the Year".

text.jpText:
さらにレース後、観客たちの会話を聞き、
今の自分の走りでは大井の皆の凄さを
証明するには至っていないと思い知る。
text.enText:
Furthermore, after the race, listening to the 
conversations of the spectators, I realized 
that my current performance was not enough to 
prove how great everyone in Oi was. I 
realized that my current performance was not 
enough to prove how great everyone in Oi was.

text.jpText:
次の目標である『天皇賞（秋）』は間近だが、
イナリワンの中で『年度代表ウマ娘』への
焦燥感が大きくなりつつあった……。
text.enText:
The next target, "Tennou-sho (Autumn)," is 
just around the corner, but the sense of 
frustration for the "horsegirl of the Year" 
was growing within Inari One. Inari One's 
frustration with the "horsegirl of the Year" 
was growing. ……
